name: CoolKangarooEnglishSchool
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cool kangaroo
des:
Cool Kangaroo English School helps high school ESL students (ages 13 and higher) develop English conversational skills in fun and engaging way:

Your students will:
- participate in funny dialogues,
- practice new vocabulary in the context of conversation,
- develop correct pronunciation, 
- learn how to use new words in a sentence. 

Cool Kangaroo consists of ten minute lessons, which can be easily incorporated in the classroom settings as well as used as students' homework at home.

To start the program, just say "Alexa, start cool kangaroo!"

For any feedback and comments, please contact us via our website at www.thinkingcapinnovations.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
